articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Beyoncé Surprises Fans at ‘Renaissance’ Event in Brazil Following Concert Film Premiere - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The superstar showed her appreciation for fans in Brazil as she took to the stage in a silver sequined dress.
articles.content:
Beyoncé made the day for many of her fans in Brazil with a surprise appearance at a special event for her Renaissance concert film.
Renaissance: A Film by Beyoncé premiered in Brazil on Thursday and… [+1710 chars]
